# General Provost of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps

| image = File:Funeral of Hassan Dehnawi.jpg
| caption = An honor guard of IRGC Provosts in funeral of a Martyr in 2013.
| country =
| branch = General Staff
| type = Military police
| role = Provost, honor guard
| size =
| command_structure =  Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps
| garrison = Tehran
| commander1 =  Sardar Sartip II Pasdar Hatam Ebadi
| commander1_label = Provost marshal
| identification_symbol =
| identification_symbol_label = Ceremonial Flag
}}
General Provost of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps () is the provost and military police with an authority within all military branches of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps and Basij militia. It is a subdivision to the Joint Staff of IRGC.
